setting.name: Server Configuration
setting.comment: Setup for netsync and overall app structure

setting.name: server:connect
setting.comment: If false, won't connect udp sender / listener for server or client

setting.name: server:ip
setting.comment: The multicast ip address and port of the server

setting.name: server:send_port
setting.comment: The port to send to the server

setting.name: server:listen_port
setting.comment: The port to listen to the server

setting.name: console:show
setting.comment: Whether to show the console window or not. If this setting is missing, debug mode will create a console, release will not.
